# REMAP

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of REMAP is to evaluate data collected across the Everglades as part of the Regional Environmental Monitoring and Assessment Program (R-EMAP) [link](https://www.epa.gov/everglades/environmental-monitoring-everglades).
